revised_title: Extra-Uterine Conception and Ovarian Gestation: A Case Study
tldr: The author presents a case of a human fetus found in the ovarium, providing evidence of extra-uterine conception and ovarian gestation. The case study illustrates the development of the fetus within the ovarium and the formation of the placenta, which appears to be similar to that of a typical in-utero conception. This rare case offers valuable insights into the process of conception and embryonic development.
